text.section:
In this section, "Prince George's County fire and explosive investigator" means an individual who:
is assigned full time to the Fire and Explosive Investigations Section of the Prince George's County Fire/EMS Department;
has attained the position of deputy fire marshal; and
has successfully completed a training program from a police training school approved by the Maryland Police Training Commission established under Title 3, Subtitle 2 of the Public Safety Article.

The Prince George's County Fire Chief:
may limit the authority of a Prince George's County fire and explosive investigator under this section; and
shall express the limitation in a written policy.
